api tu khalu punaryaducyate   avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityeṣā

vibhaṅgaḥ katamaḥ? avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ ityavidyā katamā? yat
katama pratītyasamutpādo nāma | yadidam - avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ | /    saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam | vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam |

yathābhūtasyābhisamaya udapādi | avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃskārā bhavanti | /    avidyāpratyayāś ca punaḥ saṃskārāḥ |

cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyo draṣṭavyaḥ, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo /    ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo
eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo /    ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśaḥ, tathā hi bhagavan
śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo /    jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo /    ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo
ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ /    śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo
śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśo kāyasaṃsparśo /    manaḥsaṃsparśo duḥkha iti dharmaṃ deśayanti/ manaḥsaṃsparśo 'nātmeti śānta
tathā ca manyate upalambhayogena/ evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo /    jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo 'dhyātmaśūnya iti
manasikaroti/ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ /    kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo bahirdhāśūnya iti manasikaroti/ yāvat
śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo /    manaḥsaṃsparśo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti manasikaroti/
spraṣṭavyaṃ dharmaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo /    jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ

ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo 'dhyātmaśūnya
iti manasikaroti śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ /    kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo bahirdhāśūnya iti manasikaroti yāvat

ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo

evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo /    manaḥsaṃsparso manaḥsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, itareṣu ca na
cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo vā śrotrasaṃsparśo vā ghrāṇasaṃsparśo vā jihvāsaṃsparśo vā /    kāyasaṃsparśo vā manaḥsaṃsparśo vā. cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā vā
ghrāṇasaṃsparśo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśo na sa kāyasaṃsparśo na sa
kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ, manaḥsaṃsparśa āyuṣmañ
na śrotrasaṃsparśo na ghrāṇasaṃsparśo na jihvāsaṃsparśo na kāyasaṃsparśo /    na manaḥsaṃsparśo nitya ity upaparīkṣate/ nānitya iti na sukha iti na
na ghrāṇasaṃsparśo na jihvāsaṃsparśo na kāyasaṃsparśo na manaḥsaṃsparśo

parallels.parsegmenttext: Samyuktagama (966-972 according to the Chinese canon)
parallels.parsegment: 13. tisra imā agnivaiśyāyana vedanāḥ. katamās tisraḥ. sukhā vedanā duḥkhā /    vedanā, aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā ca. itīmās tisro vedanāḥ kiṃnidānāḥ
tatra vedanā katamā / tadyathā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca vedanā / tatra
gardhāśritā, naiṣkramyāśritā vedanā sukhāpi duḥkhāpy aduḥkhāsukhāpi /
naivasātaṃ nāsātaṃ veditaṃ [vigatarāgaṃ] | vedanāgatamidamucyate duḥkhā /    aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā | sā punaryā pañcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktā | sā kāyikī |
(pṛ) vedanā katamā | (u) sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca | (pṛ) sukhā katamā
tatra vedanā katamā [|] tadyathā sukhā, duḥkhā, (Śbh_Sh 294) aduḥkhāsukhā /    ca vedanā | tatra sukhāpi kāyikī | duḥkhāpyaduḥkhāsukhāpi [|] yathā kāyikī
vedanā sukhādibhinnā | sūtre tūktam  sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā /    aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti | yadi vedyata iti vedanā | kena tadvedyata iti
jihvāsaṃsparśo yaś ca kāyasaṃsparśo yaś ca manaḥsaṃsparśo yā ca /    cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca
kāyasaṃsparśo yaś ca manaḥsaṃsparśo yā ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca
jihvāsaṃsparśo yaś ca kāyasaṃsparśo yaś ca manaḥsaṃsparśo yā ca /    cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca śrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanā yā ca
paṭvīti tad eva vikalpakam uktaṃ. ṣaṭ saṃjñākāyā vedanāvad iti. yathā /    cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedaneti vistareṇoktaṃ. tathā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā saṃjñeti
sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati/ evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśajā /    vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā kāyasaṃsparśajā
evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśajā
saṃjñāskandhavyavasthānaṃ katamat / ṣaṭ saṃjñākāyāḥ / cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā
ākiñcanyāyatanasaṃjñā / ṣaṭ saṃjñākāyāś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā saṃjñā
vedanāskandhavyavasthānaṃ katamat / ṣaḍvedanākāyāḥ / cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā

segment: atapāḥ | abṛhāḥ | sudarśanāḥ | akaniṣṭhāśceti || ārūpyadhātavaḥ katamāḥ?

caturthamanabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavāḥ bṛhatphalā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ
bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā bṛhatphalā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā /    akaniṣṭhā devās taṃ śakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate : udgṛhītavyā mārṣa
śuddhāvāsakāyikā devā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā, ye 'pi
anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ /    sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ
anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā brhatphalāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ /    sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāḥ tatra ye kauśika mahābrahmāṇo 'nuttarāyāṃ
anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ /    sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi taṃ (PvsP1 1: 76) bodhisattvaṃ

dhyānasyāśrayaṃ ca śuddhāvāsāḥ / avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā /    akaniṣṭhāśceti / kutaḥ śuddhāvāsāḥ? āryāṇāmeva teṣūtpādāt / teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ

upādānaskandhā duḥkham; tasya parijñāyai āryāṣṭaṅgo mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ; /    2) duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyaṃ katamat? tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī
paṃcopādānaskaṃdhāḥ. bhārādānaṃ katamat. tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī /    nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī. bhāranikṣepaṇaṃ katamat. yad asyā
iti vacanāt. śūtre hi tṛṣṇaivokteti. samudayasatyaṃ katamat. yāsau tṛṣṇā
upāyapravartanān nāsti tasya sūtrasya virodhaḥ. yad idam uktam idaṃ /    duḥkham āryasatyam ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayo 'yaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ iyaṃ
duḥkham / idamucyate duḥkham / tatra katamo duḥkhasamudayaḥ? yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā /    paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī ayamucyate
paṃcopādānaskaṃdhā duḥkhā / idaṃ bhikṣavaḥ duḥkham āryasatyaṃ // tatra /    katamo duḥkhasamudayo āryasatyaṃ / yāyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikā
ahaṃ (Abhidh k vy 544) duḥkhaṃ āryasatyam anabhisametya samudayam /    āryasatyam abhisameṣyāmīti vistareṇa yāvad duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadam
hetoḥ. asthānam anavakāśo yad duḥkham āryasatyam anabhisametya samudayam /    āryasatyam abhisameṣyati pūrvavat. yāvan nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. sthānam
ityādi pūrvavaditi yaḥ // /    idaṃ duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyaṃ tava khalvabhijñāya prahīṇamiti hītyādi
[tathedaṃ duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyamiti pratyekam / idaṃ /    duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya prahātavyamiti dvitīyam /]
uttānīkaroti prakāśayati / duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyaṃ / duḥkhanirodhaṃ
'calacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ
pratipadā āryasatyam || tatra duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ katamat? tadyathā -
duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam; 1) duḥkham /    āryasatyaṃ katamat? jātir duḥkhaṃ, jarā duḥkhaṃ, vyādhir duḥkhaṃ, maraṇaṃ
āryasatyāni duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ duḥkhanirodhā mārgaḥ ṣaḍ abhijñā aṣṭā

segment: nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, idamucyate /    duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyam || tatra katamadduḥkhanirodhamāryasatyam?

NidSa 23.9c kim āhārasamudayaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī /    nandirāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī | ayam āhārasamudayaḥ | evam

iti vacanāt. śūtre hi tṛṣṇaivokteti. samudayasatyaṃ katamat. yāsau tṛṣṇā /    nandīrāgasahagatā tatratarābhinandinīti. vaibhāṣika āha. prādhānyād iti.
āryasatyaṃ prajānāti, advayato vinirmuktam āryasatyaṃ prajānāti, evaṃ /    samudayam evaṃ nirodham evaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadam.

segment: vyayībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgamaḥ, idamucyate

parallels.parsegment: spraṣṭāvyayatanānāṃ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgama ityevamādi /
aśeṣaṃ prāhāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantibhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo
kāmā vigarhitāḥ kāmātmayāḥ kāmaniyantikāḥ sādhyavaśakāmānāṃ prahāṇaṃ /    varṇitaṃ pratinisargāntībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodhaḥ vyupaśamo āsamantataḥ
paryāyataḥ katamat / aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargaḥ vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo /    virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgama ityevamādi // kimupādāyocyate
aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo
yat svalpasya duḥkhasyāśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo /    virāgo nirodho vyupakṣamo 'staṅgamaḥ anyasya ca duḥkhasyāprati"
kāmānāṃ prahāṇam ākhyātaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ / kṣayo virāgo
paunarbhavikyāḥ nandīrāgasahagatāyās tatra tatrābhinandinyā aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ /    pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho (SBV I 138) vyupaśamaḥ
kāmādhyavasānaṃ kāmānāṃ prahāṇaṃ varṇitaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo /    virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'stagamaḥ stutaḥ stomito varṇitaḥ praśastaḥ
nandīrāgasahagatāye tatratatrābhinandinīye aśeṣakṣayo virāgo nirodho tyāgo /    prahāṇo pratiniḥsargo ayaṃ bhikṣavo duḥkhanirodho āryasatyaḥ // tatra
iti. bhedavivakṣāyām evam ucyate. abhedavivakṣāyāṃ tu yo virāgaḥ. tat /    prahāṇam apy ucyate. nirodho 'pītyādi.

uttānīkaroti prakāśayati / duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyaṃ / duḥkhanirodhaṃ
āryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyaṃ duḥkhanirodha āryasatyaṃ
duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyaṃ katamat? āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ;

parallels.parsegmenttext: Civaravastu of the Vinayavastvagama of the Mulasarvastivadin (= Vastu 7 of
parallels.parsegment: duḥkhanirodha idaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminīpratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ
duḥkhanirodha iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ
duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / iyam
samyagdṛṣṭiryāvatsamyaksamādhiriti / idamucyate duḥkhanirodhagāminī /    pratipadāryasatyamiti / imāni bhikṣavaścatvāryāryasatyāni / iti duḥkhamiti
duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadāryasatyamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / sa
duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadāryasatyaṃ //
duḥkhanirodhaḥ, ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti
duḥkhasamudayaḥ, ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ; iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipat /    āryasatyam iti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi
udapādi; tat khalu duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam abhijñayā
duḥkhanirodhaḥ; iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti
ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayo 'yaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad /    āryasatyaṃ yathābhūtam prajānāti; tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyataḥ
duḥkham āryasatyam ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayo 'yaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ iyaṃ
ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ. ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ. iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī /    pratipad āryasatyam iti yathabhūtaṃ prajānāti. trīṇi cāsya saṃyojanāni
duḥkhanirodhaḥ. (Abhidh k vy 515) iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad /    āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti. pūrvāvedhād iti. pūrvākṣepāt.
duḥkhanirodhaḥ. iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti.
duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti. pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu
āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasya vyayo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ, /    yo bhagavann āryasatyānāṃ vyayo na tāny āryasatyāni, iti hi āryasatyāni ca
bodhyaṅgānāṃ vyayo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni, ya āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya vyayo na /    sa āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ, ya āryasatyānāṃ vyayo na tāny āryasatyāni, yo
bodhyaṅgāni yac cādvaidhīkāraṃ, yaś ca vyayo yaś cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgo yac
kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika yaś cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgo yaś ca bodhisattvo yā

taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt /    pūrvam eva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astagamād aduḥkhāsukhaṃ
saumanasyadaurmanasyānāmastaṅgamādaduḥkhamasukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ /    caturthaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati | (pṛ) yadi pūrvameva (SSS_414)
dhyānamusaṃpadya viharati sma / sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca /    prahāṇāt pūrvameva ca /    saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ
saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ /    caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati / iti
viharati // sukhasya ca prahāṇā duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvaṃ ca /    saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamāt* aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ
prahāṇāṃ duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrve ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayor /    astaṃgamād aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam
prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt /    16710 pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṅgamād aduḥkhāsukham
upasaṃpadya viharati sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva /    saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṅgamād aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ
tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca /    prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduḥkhāsukham
saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduṣkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ /    caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ
tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati, sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca /    prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṅgamād aduḥkhāsukham
duḥkhasya ca pūrvameva prahāṇāt /    saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṅgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ
75. sa sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva /    saumanasyadaurmanasyayor aṣṭaṃgamād aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ
duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayor aṣṭaṃgamād
yasmin samaye āryaśrāvakaḥ sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt /    pūrvam eva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayor aṣṭaṃgamād aduḥkham asukham
sa sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva ca /    saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ

(ld) katamāni ca pañcendriyāṇi? śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ /    samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam imāny ucyante pañcendriyāṇi.

vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam idam ucyate

segment: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ || /    [12] tatra katamāścatastraḥ samādhibhāvanāḥ? ...........asti bhikṣavaḥ

parallels.parsegment: catasraḥ khalu samādhibhāvanāḥ | asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā"
catvāro brahmavihārāḥ | catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ | catasraḥ samādhibhāvanāḥ
punaścatasraḥ samādhibhāvanā ucyante / /    asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā vahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya
subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta catasraḥ /    pratisaṃvidaḥ katamāś catasraḥ dharmapratisaṃvid arthapratisaṃvid
catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ. katamāś catasraḥ? dharmapratisaṃvid
tasmāttarhi kumāra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ākāṅkṣet kimityahaṃ catasraḥ /    pratisaṃvidaḥ sākṣātkuryāmiti | katamāścatasraḥ? yaduta arthapratisaṃvidaṃ
dharmapratisaṃvit niruktipratisaṃvit pratibhānapratisaṃvit | imā /    bhikṣavaścatasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ || /    [25] katame bhikṣavo 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ? nāsti tathāgatasya
divasasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitena samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati | iyaṃ /    samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanapratibhānalābhāya
catasraḥ khalu samādhibhāvanāḥ | asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā"
(VIII.27, 28) vistara iti. asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā
dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya vartate. asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā
(AvSū, Vaidya 321) caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati | iyaṃ /    samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate
bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya saṃvartate | tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā /    samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya
yaduta adhyātmakaṃ vivekajena prītisukhena | iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā /    bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharma(sukha)vihārāya saṃvartate || tatra

(AvSū, Vaidya 321) caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati | iyaṃ /    samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate

manyanāpagatamanāsvāditaṃ sarvanimittāpagataṃ dhyānam / idameṣāṃ /    dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya veditavyam /
bhavatīyamaśubhatā | evamāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya
asti samādhibhāvanā dṛṣṭadharmasukha [vihāra]āyaṃ saṃvartate | asti
mithyāprayuktānāmagnipraveśātaṭaprapātā 'naśanasthānādibhiḥ samyagdhyānaṃ /    dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya cāyatyāṃ akṛchreṇa sahaiva sukhena saha
laukikaṃ lokottarañca / tatpunaryathāyogaṃ trividhaṃ veditavyam / /    dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya dhyānaṃ bodhisattva samādhiguṇanirhārāya dhyāna
veditavyāḥ / sāsyāpramāṇabhāvanā ādita eva paramadṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya /    bhavati / apramāṇapuṇyasaṃbhāraparigrahopacayāya bhavati / anuttarāyāṃ

paścātpūrvasaṃjñī bhaviṣyati ūrdhvamadhaḥsaṃjñī ca, vivṛtena /    cetasāparyavanaddhena saprabhāsasahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmi na ca me
supratibandhonavamasaṃjñā - vesthitā(?) samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati
bhikṣavaḥ katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanena
[12] tatra katamāścatastraḥ samādhibhāvanāḥ? ...........asti bhikṣavaḥ /    samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanapratilābhāya
saṃvartate | asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā
catasraḥ khalu samādhibhāvanāḥ | asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā"
(VIII.27, 28) vistara iti. asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā
dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya vartate. asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā /    bahulīkṛtā divyacakṣurabhijñājñānadarśanāya saṃvartate. asti
(AvSū, Vaidya 321) caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati | iyaṃ /    samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate
prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate | tatra katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā /    bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya saṃvartate? iha bhikṣavo bhikṣu
bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya saṃvartate | tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā /    samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya
yaduta adhyātmakaṃ vivekajena prītisukhena | iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā /    bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharma(sukha)vihārāya saṃvartate || tatra
bahulīkṛtā divyacakṣurabhijñājñānadarśanāya saṃvartate. asti /    samādhibhāvanāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāprabhedāya saṃvartate. asti
punaścatasraḥ samādhibhāvanā ucyante / /    asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā vahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya
yathāpraṇihitaṃ yāvat pratyavekṣate | iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā /    bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya saṃvartate | tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā

cittānudarśasmṛtyupasthānam, dharme dharmānudarśasmṛtyupasthānam // /    45. katamāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni? tadyathā   utpannānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ
(la) katamāni ca subhūte catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni? yaduta (i) adhyātmakāye
katame bhagavan lokottarāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ bhagavān āha catvāri /    smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi
bhagavan anāsravā dharmāḥ bhagavān āha catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri /    samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni sapta
gacchanti bhagavān āha tad yathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri /    samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta
bhagavān āha: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra
bhagavān āha: tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni
hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyam. catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayitavyāni, /    catvāri samyakprahāṇāni jñātavyāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ jñātavyāḥ,

katame ca subhūte catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ? /    chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipādaś
ceme prahāṇasaṃskārāḥ prahīṇeṣv anuśayeṣu pariniṣpanne samādhau, /    chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipāda ity ucyate /
ṛddhipādāḥ. chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipādaḥ. evaṃ
cittasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ /    virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ mā me cittamatilīnaṃ
mīmāṃsāsamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati /    vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ mā me
upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgam || iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati /    vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam || evaṃ
dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ
nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam || vīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati /    vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam ||
prītisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ
virāganiśrita nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam || samādhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ /    bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ
vyavasargapariṇatam || upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ /    virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam || imāni bhikṣavaḥ
/ vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ
bhāvanāya paripūraye ... / chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgataṃ /    ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ
2.27 (yāvac ca bhikṣavaḥ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayiṣyanti vivekaniśritaṃ /    virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ
dharmavicayavīryaprītiprasrabdhisamādhyupekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayiṣyanti /    vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ vṛddhir
samyagadhigataṃ suvyākhyātaṃ vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ
suvyākhyātaṃ vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ
chandasamādhiprahāṇaṃ saṃskārasamanvāgata  /    20724 m ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ
mīmāṃsāsamādhiprahāṇasaṃskāra{{samanvāgatam ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati /    vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasarge}}
20811 smṛti{saṃbodhyaṅgaṃ} yāvad upekṣā{saṃbodhyaṅgaṃ} bhāvayati /    vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ
saṃskārasamanvāgatam ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ
mīmāṃsāsamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatam ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati /    vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasarge (PSP1: 208)
upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ
[15] tatra katame catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ? iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ /    chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati
bhaviṣyati nābhigṛhītam ||3 || /    mīmāṃsāsamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati
bhāvanāya paripūraye ... / chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgataṃ /    ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ
9     katame catvāraḥ iha subhūte chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatam
vyavasargapariṇataṃ /    10     vīryasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatam ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati
10     vīryasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatam ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati /    cittasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatam ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati

parallels.parsegmenttext: Dasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, chapter 1 and 2 translated from the Tibetan
parallels.parsegment: cittasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhīpādo, /    mīmāṃsāsamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipādaḥ. eta ucyante catvāra
cittavīryamīmāṃsāsamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipādaḥ, ima ucyate
vīryacittamīmāṃsāsamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipāda ity ucyate /

segment: mīmāṃsā nātilīnā bhaviṣyati nābhigṛhītam ||4 || ime bhikṣavaścatvāra
ṛddhipādāḥ || /    [16] tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamāni pañcendriyāṇi? yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ

parallels.parsegment: indriyāṇi dhandhāni bhavanti mṛdūni saśīghravāhīni | katamāni pañca? /    yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ
pañca lokottarāṇi indriyāṇi adhimātrāṇi bhavanti tīkṣṇāni śīghravāhīni | /    katamāni pañca? yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ
yaduta pañcendriyāṇi katamāni pañca | tadyathā śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ
mahāyānaṃ yad uta pañcendriyāṇi katamāni pañca śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ
punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta /    pañcendriyāṇi. katamāni pañca? śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ (PvsP1 2: 81)
na śīghravāhīni | katamāni pañca? yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryandriyaṃ
pratyavekṣaṇajātīyo bhavati | idamucyate prajñendriyam || imāni bhikṣavaḥ /    pañcendriyāṇi || /    [17] tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamāni pañca balāni? yaduta śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ
mahāsatvasya mahāyānaṃ yaduta /    14     pañca balāni. katamāni pañca. śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalaṃ
bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta pañcabalāni katamāni pañca /    śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ prajñābalam tac
punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta /    pañcabalāni. katamāni pañca? śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalaṃ
(ld) katamāni ca pañcendriyāṇi? śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ

bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti? bhagavān /    āha: na khalu subhūte asaṃskṛtaṃ prabhāvayaty api tu khalu vacanaṃ
'yan tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. /    bhagavān āha: na khalu subhūte asaṃskṛtaṃ bhāvayati api tu lokavyavahāraṃ
nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti. 5. bhagavān āha: ahaṃ te
deśayatu me bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svabuddhabuddhatām,
sūryagarbhārcivimalendro nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho /    bhagavān / ayaṃ punaḥ saṃrocano gaṇanātikrāntaiḥ
subhūtir āha: na punar bhagavan sarvadharmaviṣayavaśavartī tathāgato 'rhan /    samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ? /    bhagavān āha: syāt subhūte sarvadharmaviṣayavaśavartī tathāgato 'rhan
tatkasmāt? mā khalvānanda sattvāḥ kausīdyamāpatsyante / devabhūtaḥ sa /    bhagavān tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ, vayaṃ tu manuṣyamātrāḥ / na
bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ adyāgreṇa te āyuṣmaṃ cchramaṇoddeśa nāsau /    bhagavāṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śāstā vyapadeṣṭavyo nāpy
bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo 'dyāgreṇāyuṣman śramaṇoddeśa nāsau bhagavāṃs /    tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śāstā / evaṃrūpasyānyatamānyatmasya
śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi nāśayitavyo Ō adyadagreṇa te āyuṣman śramaṇuddeśa na /    caiva so bhagavāṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho śāstā vyapadiśitavyo /
abhyavakāśagato vā śūnyāgāramadhyagato vā evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate   evaṃ sa /    bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato

parallels.parsegment: bhagavān āha / bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ kāśyapo nāma /    tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavāñ chāstā loka utpannaḥ / tena khalu

parallels.parsegmenttext: Dasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, chapter 1 and 2 translated from the Tibetan
parallels.parsegment: sattvānāṃ cyutyupapattiṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti; /    āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme
sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, sa āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād /    anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya
śroṇa vihāreṇa viharan nacirād eva āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ /    prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā, upasaṃpadya
'pareṇa samayena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ

segment: tathāgatabalāni || /    [23] katamāni bhikṣavastathāgatasya catvāri vaiśāradyāni? iha bhagavān

parallels.parsegment: jayasaṃpannāni agarhitāni vijñairiti | imāni catvāri srotaāpattyaṅgāni || /    [22] katamāni bhikṣavo daśa tathāgatabalāni? tathāgataḥ sthānaṃ ca
kṣayād anāsravaṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. imāni /    daśatathāgatabalāni. /    (14) katamāni ca subhūte tathāgatasya catvāri vaiśāradyāni? (i)
āsravakṣayeṇānāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, imāny ucyante /    daśa tathāgatabalāni. /    katamāni ca subhūte catvāri vaiśāradyāni? samyaksaṃbuddhasya ca me
mahāyānaṃ. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya mahāyānaṃ yad /    idaṃ catvāri /    7     vaiśāradyāni katamāni catvāri samyaksaṃbuddhasya me pratijānataḥ |
sahadharmeṇeti | imāni bhikṣavo bhagavatastathāgatasya catvāri /    vaiśāradyāni ||
bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta catvāri vaiśāradyāni /    katamāni catvāri yad uta samyaksaṃbuddhasya vata me pratijānataḥ ime
catvāri vaiśāradyāni. katamāni catvāri? /    yad uta samyaksaṃbuddhasya bata me pratijānataḥ, ime dharmā abhisaṃbuddhā
kleśairanavamṛdyatvāt(?) | imāni bhikṣavaḥ pañca balāni || /    [18] tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni? yaduta
cyutyupapattijñānabalaṃ. āsravakṣayajñānabalaṃ ca. sūtraṃ tu daśāyuṣmantas /    tathāgatabalāni. katamāni daśa. ihāyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ sthānaṃ ca

kṣīṇāsravasya me pratijānataḥ ime āsravā na parikṣīṇā ity atra bata me

5 paśyatu śaradāśataṃ // na cāhaṃ tam ānanda samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke /    samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ
316.003. nāhamānanda taṃ samanupaśyāmi sadevaloke samāraloke sabrahmaloke /    saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣikāyāṃ sāsurāyām yastvanayā
yadā nādrākṣaṃ sadevake loke sabrahmake samārake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ /    prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāṃ sadṛśam. tasya me sadṛśaṃ samanupaśyamānasya
sabrahma^loke saśramaṇa^brāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sa^deva^mānuṣikāyāṃ
taṃ samanupaśyāmaḥ sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake /    saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāṃ yaḥ samarthaḥ
nāhaṃ ānaṃda taṃ dharme samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake /    saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāṃ ca imāṃ vasudhārā nāma
manuṣyāṇāṃ ca nāham ānanda taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi | sadevake loke /    samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevāsuramānuṣyāṇāṃ
anavadyo bhavati sarvajātaḥ / adoṣaḥ sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake /    saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyām / kulīno bhavati uttamabuddhakulasaṃbhūto
bhavati sarvajātivādadoṣaiḥ sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake /    saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyām / ebhirmārṣāścatuṣṣaṣṭyākāraiḥ
śāriputra samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake /    saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyām imāṃ prajñāpāramitām upārambhābhiprāyaḥ
pratijānata ime dharmā nābhisaṃbuddhā ity atra me kaścit sadevake loke /    samārake, sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ vā dharmā kopayed iti

uktaṃ bhagavatā; ekāny araṇyāni vṛkṣamūlāni śūnyāgārāṇi /    parvatakandaragiriguhapalālapuñjābhyavakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni (Śay-v 36)
sthānasampattadyathā | araṇyamvā, vṛkṣamūlamvā, śūnyāgāramvā tatra /    parvatakandaraṃ vā, giriguhā vā, palālapuṃjāni vā śūnyāgāramityucyate |
